overview: Ms. Linda B. Ginsburg is a Managing Director at Vernon & Park Capital and brings nearly 20 years of experience in the investment banking industry. As a founding principal at Vector Securities International, Inc. (â€œVectorâ€), a leading investment bank focused on the healthcare industry, Ms. Ginsburg played a central role in the structuring, negotiation and execution of numerous mergers and acquisitions, public and private offerings, strategic alliances, fairness opinions, corporate valuations and private equity investments. In 1999, Vector was purchased by Prudential Securities where Ms. Ginsburg remained as a Managing Director. Ms. Ginsburg assisted Mr. Ginsburg in the formation of Fund I and in the documentation of investments and other legal matters and now plays a central role at VPC. Ms. Ginsburg received her BBA from George Washington University in 1982 and her JD/MBA from Stanford in 1986.
